body:
Install by running `pip3 install MozPhab`
Please check the detailed [documentation](https://moz-conduit.readthedocs.io/en/latest/phabricator-user.html#id2).

This is the last Github release of MozPhab `\o/`. 

- [1582122](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1582122) - Fix git config reading issue
- [1517463](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1517463) - Install from PyPI and self destroy current version

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.39...1.40)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/f24103f519b5cf4095512f9baa48f8fcd3604c2b/moz-phab)

- [1579043](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1579043) - Check if Git is a available before updating MozPhab
- [1580354](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1580354) - (HG) Bookmarks with spaces are now available
- [1576603](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1576603) - Credentials are now installed without calling Arcanist
- [1574959](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1574959) - Phabricator knows which VCS was used to create a revision

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.38...1.39)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/02cbbd0e771cdec636bb320d10d97491468a4078/moz-phab)

- [1570648](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1570648) - Handle inaccessible Phabricator revisions
- [1580354](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1580354) - Handle spaces in bookmark names

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.37...1.38)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/842501064562312b93973d7fc172b259729e8d2c/moz-phab)

- [1557889](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id==1557889) - Groups are added if requested while updating a WIP revision
- [1574009](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id==1574009) - Checking for Git executable only if really needed
- [1575178](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id==1575178) - Requesting a review from a disabled user is not allowed

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.36...1.37)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/28b65885c8fb62d687c5355613efe9f84080dbc4/moz-phab)

- [1574429](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id==1574429) - Fix binary file upload for no arc

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.35...1.36)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/4c75600220c5828c5924bcd3d9f5ed1150ebbd47/moz-phab)

- [1572335](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id==1572335) - Fix updating someone else's revision

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.34...1.35)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/aa6770c61faac5350d0d1d5e12be25def6701d72/moz-phab)

- [1571042](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id==1571042) - Fixed double slash in updated commit messages
- [1572333](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id==1572333) - Temporary workaround for the Unicode error in Windows

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.33...1.34)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/15eb3eb8bc05be09359e716c0fb59e572d8f86f0/moz-phab)

- [1569785](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id==1569785) - Fix an API error when updating a revision without reviewers

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.32...1.33)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/9909549c795bb902e6d9d0ea1949ea22fd684b49/moz-phab)

- [1569162](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1569162) - `--review` option fixed
- [1568478](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1568478) - UTF8 username fixed on some systems
- [1555267](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1555267) - Experimental: (Git) Submitting a revision without using Arcanist (behind the `--no-arc` switch)
- [1569155](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1569155) - (Mercurial) user-defined bookmarks are not deleted

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.31...1.32)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/dedc9e07710d8b3741cbc8fb89ac053f6275986a/moz-phab)

- [1565502](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1565502) - Spinner switched off

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.30...1.31)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/034ec2f956f71d06cb6e46077a2abb65702a3ca7/moz-phab)

- [1567252](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1567252) - Allow patching from authors with names in Unicode

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.29...1.30)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/943f25fa9a85cea4a3d11f308aa17952a4591f1f/moz-phab)

- [1556332](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1556332) - Abandoned revisions are ignored when patching
- [1545566](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1545566) - UTF-8 allowed in commit messages
- [1562225](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1562225) - Full URI to the revision allowed in patching
- [1534365](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1534365) - (Mercurial) Restore current revision after submitting


[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.28...1.29)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/d5326d02aefc08bd0de8071bdecc49f86584cccc/moz-phab)

- [1563706](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1563706) - Fixes patching without children

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.27...1.28)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/d0dfb29eedcdfd9a206a182cd37683a190d9aa7e/moz-phab)

- [1554587](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1554587) - Use size-based rotation for log files
- [1537990](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1537990) - Do not use Arcanist for patches
- [1540270](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1540270) - Fixed upgrading Arcanist
- [1548401](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1548401) - Show spinner for lengthy actions

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.26...1.27)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/b8bf713614b5e2109e854db5d27548d01dba5f0b/moz-phab)

- [1554447](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1554447) do not query Phabricator with an empty list

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.25...1.26)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/15d71924ede367e31a2ad6be64b06d6114e45967/moz-phab)

- [1529175](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1529175) arc updated to skip specific prompts

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/24...1.25)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/b4c3c4a04f33d49a7f8a1b4183aaa687c09d1d6a/moz-phab)

- [1549672](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1549672)  `--less-context` added to submit
- [1513116](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1513116) reviewers are not added to the revision for WIP submits
- [1542625](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1542625)  Allow untracked fles in the worktree

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/23...24)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/880bf6ecd82942d4ac12f5b7c7c0f3e09ddecfb5/moz-phab)

- [1544902](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1544902) Respect `$MOZBUILD_STATE_PATH` environmental variable
- [1531627](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1531627) Reviewers will be added if none present in Phabricator revision
- [1538280](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1538280) Update the bug id in Phabricator 


[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.22...23)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/d0e4945c22df02bab49701bf380fa07cc5985811/moz-phab)

- [1544727](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1544727) fix IO error on new installs

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.21...1.22)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/e00be1561372dd5472cd76ecdba7f313804af875/moz-phab)

- [1530597](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1530597) r!reviewer supported
- [1544459](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1544459) always log DEBUG output to a log file 

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.20...1.21)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/3f4bebcf2bad31d05bb71c5c92cb0688504f34c9/moz-phab)

- [1534300](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1534300) Handle Unicode characters in commit messages
- [1529176](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1529176) moz-phab will install Mozilla version of Arcanist automatically
- [1537700](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1537700) run `arc` commands via moz-phab

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.19...1.20)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/a35696157c060cbc7a5a600f4d033f07b6c18da9/moz-phab)

- [1491190](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1491190)`--message` - allow to customize update message

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.18...1.19)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/99d2a0086c54dcd61c9d43bebf0eea82c0e85822/moz-phab)

- [1527621](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1527621) - (Git) `--no-branch` patching without creating a branch 
- [1527646](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1527646) - (Mercurial) - patch when unknown files are present
- [1527765](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1527765) - Patching UTF-8 files fixed

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.17...1.18)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/fbe49495280327241a7b0e532ddbb8bc40405b3d/moz-phab)

- [1527288](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1527288) Use cinnabar extension in `patch` command

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.16...1.17)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/f2e2965d8b9fba5db9420cea5c8774c52dd1b2ac/moz-phab)

- User's VCS configuration is used by default. Use the `--safe-mode` switch if in trouble
- Added patching stack of revisions

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.15...1.16)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/0452b93e9c3d5ba27ac552bb2a24162cc868394d/moz-phab)

- [1522391](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1522391) prevent arc from waiting on user input, which manifests as a moz-phab hang

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.14...1.15)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/267fbf03bec6b6910aed79e81ac95ef33db053fa/moz-phab)

- [1522748] Broken help fixed

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.13...1.14)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/91549ae9a6d8fd8fe00350f4fa872bd85a6370a9/moz-phab)

- [Bug 1520155](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1520155) Allow DAG branch point commits to be submitted in Mercurial repositories
- [Bug 1519540](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1519540) Keep original commit author when amending commits

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.12...1.13)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/1c549f20afaa852a41f173d62fffe6d7e4b64911/moz-phab)

- Improve handling of temporary files for cross-platform compatibility 

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.11...1.12)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/75545b182dbc1d057fa4afc61729782834c3b994/moz-phab)

- moz-phab is working with arcanist installed as a package
- Change in range selection. moz-phab is now following the local VCS `log` command
- Calendar support - block submit if any reviewer is unavailable

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.10...1.11)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/1e3207101d00b440538be46247a5e2de45877fd7/moz-phab)

- group reviewers are checked by all hashtags

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.9...1.10)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/264fe8aa4081f4f6c2a69c786fb86e2475e84e55/moz-phab)

- group reviewers are supported
- WIP switch added
- `submit` becomes a default `moz-phab` command
- The user is informed if a revision will be created or updated before taking an action

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.8...1.9)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/a14b019d3c34864ff3e54b6da4e5405de053f49d/moz-phab)

- Speed improvement - rebase after all amends

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.7...1.8)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/d898344dc75b4e919aea2f6ea007347b2927a195/moz-phab)

- Prevent non-linear history in Git
- Check for all reviewers in a single call

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.6...1.7)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/d366a7eada5f8f25d7591c15a4fd702b31204a6b/moz-phab)

- Check reviewer names before submission

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.5...1.6)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/38f15f241b780f4141b9a1930e142dd756080ef8/moz-phab)

- Speed improvement - faster stack list validation
- Update title and summary in Phabricator
- New reviewers marked with `r=`

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.4...1.5)

[download moz-phab](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla-conduit/review/1f686e79f204e07c4f1abf93c347b587db920997/moz-phab)
- Git support
- Show arc output as it is generated
- Check arc configuration before taking any action
- Show more info in debug output

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.3...1.4)

- Added `--nolint` argument to submit.
- Checking if `./.hg/` and `./.git/` are directories.
- Fixed replacing the bug entry in the commit title.

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.2...1.3)

- do not require a reviewer to submit a revision
- ARC command can be configured
- reviewer flag is changed from "r=" to "r?"

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.1...1.2)

- Added support for Windows

[all changes](https://github.com/mozilla-conduit/review/compare/1.0...1.1)
- initial MVP release
